org.helm.notation

Class MonomerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.helm.notation.MonomerFactory

  • public class MonomerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a factory class to build monomer database from MonomerDBGZEnconded.xml document
    Author:
    zhangtianhong

      • merge

        public void merge(MonomerCache remoteMonomerCache)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  MonomerException
        merge remote monomerCache with local monomerCache, will throw exception if conflicts found. Client needs to resolve conflicts prior to calling merge
        Parameters:
        remoteMonomerCache -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        MonomerException
